workInfo.description: A suite of products to build and operate the multi-level marketing (MLM) business using Micro service-based Architecture.

It is a cluster of portals implemented using Angular 12 having independent micro services like Shopping Sites, Account, Enrolment, Admin portals, Stores, Product Catalogs, Order Management and Payment Systems to support worldwide markets.
Modernization of a Retail business by using Angular and ReactJS.
